price: 50. And this is a blessed Reminder (the Qur’ân) which We have sent down: will you then (dare to) deny it?[2]
arabic: وَهَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞ مُّبَارَكٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُۚ أَفَأَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
footnotes:
(V.21:50).
a) See the footnote of (V.10:37).
b) See the footnote of (V.3:85).

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wahādhā dhik'run mubārakun anzalnāhu afa-antum lahu munkirūna
